items.title: Will iPhones cost more In US because of Trump's tariffs?
items.description: Some analysts say that if costs incurred by tariffs pass to consumers, US iPhone prices could rise by hundreds of dollars.

items.title: Michelle Obama breaks silence on divorce rumours
items.description: The former first lady says people were wrong to make assumptions that the couple were getting a divorce.

items.title: Unsecured penguin caused helicopter crash in South Africa
items.description: Pilot lost control after bird in cardboard box slid off a passenger's knee and knocked controls, aviation authority finds.

items.title: Kenya police fire tear gas during school drama competition
items.description: A play critical of the government was initially disqualified from the competition under unclear circumstances.

items.title: Sudan accuses UAE of 'complicity in genocide' at world court
items.description: Sudan's government alleges that the UAE is arming its civil war opponents, which it denies.
